mapper.select: SELECT e.evc_id as evc_id, e.evc_address as evc_address, e.evc_name as evc_name, e.evc_lat as evc_lat, e.evc_long as evc_long, c.charger_facsmall as charger_facsmall, c.charger_opsmall as charger_opsmall, c.charger_userlimit as charger_userlimit, c.charger_mechine as charger_mechine, c.charger_type as charger_type FROM evc e JOIN evc_cg c ON e.evc_id = c.evc_id
